import '../App.css' import React, { useState } from 'react' import { Container, Form, Nav, Navbar, Row } from 'react-bootstrap' const NavbarC = ({filterbysearch}) => { const [searchValue , setSearchValue]=useState(''); const onSearch=(val)=>{ filterbysearch(val) } return (
مطعم عبد
setSearchValue(e.target.value)} value={searchValue} />
) } export default NavbarC
